farthest.translation[0].definitions[0].d: at or to the greatest distance away; a superlative form of ‘far’
farthest.translation[0].definitions[0].e: My sister was the one who travelled farthest.
She lived farthest away from school of all of us.
farthest.translation[1].definitions[0].d: the most distant; a superlative form of ‘far’
farthest.translation[1].definitions[0].e: the farthest corners of the globe
